The source code is hosted at [http://www.github.com github].

==Read Access==

To check out a copy of the source code for yourself:

`git clone git://github.com/jayway/facebook-test-java-api.git`

Or see this project's github pages: [https://github.com/jayway/facebook-test-java-api/]. 
You can browse the source code there.

To learn more about Git, see for example http://github.com/.

==Commit Access==

Anybody can submit code through github!

  # Go to [https://github.com/jayway/facebook-test-java-api/] and fork the project. 
  # Do your changes in your clone of the project.
  # Click "pull request" on your repository to tell "tobiassodergren" there are changes to bring in.
